titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Xenia Joukoff Eudin Papers, ca. 1930-1970
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Writings, translations, notes, and clippings, relating to the Russian Revolution and to various aspects of Soviet society in the 1920s and 1930s, including politics, foreign policy, economics, agriculture, and minority policies.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Xenia Joukoff Eudin Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1984.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Research associate at the Hoover Institution, Stanford University
Co-editor, Features and Figures of the Past: Government Opinion in the Reign of Nicholas II, by V.I. Gurko, Stanford University Press
Co-editor, The Life of a Chemist, Memoirs of V. N. Ipatieff, Stanford University Press

eventgrp.event: Co-author, Soviet Russia and the East, l920-l927, A Documentary Survey, Stanford University Press
Co-author, Soviet Russia and the West, l920-l927, A Documentary Survey, Stanford University Press

chronitem.event: Co-author, M. N. Roy's Mission in China: The Communist-Kuomintang Split in l972, University of California Press
Co-author, Soviet Foreign Policy, l928-l934, Volumes I and II, Hoover Institution Publications and Pennsylvania State University Press

scopecontent.p: Correspondence arranged alpha-betically by last name of correspondent.
Drafts, notes, manuscripts and other research materials relating to X. Eudin's writing endeavors arranged alphabetically by title or by subject.
Printed matter, reprints, photo-copies and other materials, collected by X. Eudin, arranged alphabetically by author or subject.
Index cards listing sources used in research and writings.
